title: About the Nexus Blitz walking nexus.....
body: Can we NOT have it capable of healing in the fountain???

replies.body: Coincidentally I was just watching a game where one team managed to get their walking Nexus in their fountain. Looked pretty degenerate, in a 'funny when it happens the first time and then never again' way. We'll make some changes.

If you guys haven't already, please do a pass on %HP damage on the nexus. I was playing full AP Elise last night and my human form Q did 2k+ damage and once it got to 5k health left I killed it with Spider Q.

Brand is auto win at nexus sudden death.
{{champion:63}}  his passive goes off even once and he completely obliterates it.

The first time it happened to us, we had been losing ALL game and finally pulled a comeback, we had waves of minions plus our Graves on the enemy Nexus, and it became the walking nexus with 100 health left. So it went to full health, and because we had so many minions, it couldn't leave the fountain while our untouched Nexus walked all the way across the map and handed a free win to the enemy team we had just spent so much time and effort making a comeback against.

It wasn't _funny_ the first time it happened to us.

_Mario Kart_ has never displayed jackassitude of that caliber in snatching an earned victory away, you hear me? :|

its a trash mechanic; take it out - a team can be winning 30-5 and our nexus walks into the enemy teams fountain. Give anyone a reason why they should play this infuriating game mode when they can be destroying yet lose to this broken mechanic? - played 4 games out of 6 where this has happened and it literally kills any reason why the fuck people should be playing this mode let alone your video game!
Simple, allow them to pass through units. A fully alive enemy team can body block their nexus and prevent it from leaving.
But...but this sounds amazing to watch. Don't destroy the thing.

Would it be possible for when it spawn to reduce current death timers.

I haved played twice where the team is dead when it spawns and by the time people respawn, the nexus is dead

"Looked pretty degenerate"

That's pretty damn funny, coming from the new Lead Designer's fingers. You do you, Meddler. :P
omfg can ryze tele the nexus!?
I have not heard of this. Do you have a video of this happening?
